description: A chest shop for economy plugins.

permissions.description: Gives access to all ChestShop permissions
permissions.name: ChestShop.*

permissions.description: Gives access to all user ChestShop permissions
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.*

permissions.description: Allows the user to create a shop that sells and buys any item
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create

permissions.description: Allows the user to create a shop that sells any item
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.buy

permissions.description: Allows the user to create a shop that buy any item
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.sell

permissions.description: Allows user to create a shop that sells item with itemID like in the permission node (replace (itemID) with NUMERICAL item ID)
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.(itemID)

permissions.description: Allows user to buy certain (itemID) from a shop (replace (itemID) with NUMERICAL item ID)
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.buy.(itemID)

permissions.description: Allows user to sell certain (itemID) from a shop (replace (itemID) with NUMERICAL item ID)
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.sell.(itemID)

permissions.description: Allows user to buy from a shop
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.buy

permissions.description: Allows user to sell to a shop
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.sell

permissions.description: User doesn't have to pay the shop creation fee.
permissions.name: ChestShop.nofee

permissions.description: Allows user to toggle messages.
permissions.name: ChestShop.toggle

permissions.description: Allows user to modify/destroy other stores and create an Admin Shops
permissions.name: ChestShop.admin

permissions.description: Allows user only to view other store chests, he can't destroy them or create an Admin Shop
permissions.name: ChestShop.mod

permissions.description: Gives you the power to do create shops for (some name), for example your town.
permissions.name: ChestShop.name.(some name)

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells food
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.food

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells diamond gear
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.diamondgrade

permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.irongrade

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells gold gear
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.goldgrade

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells stone tools and chain armor
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.stonegrade

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells wood tools and leather armor
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.woodgrade

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells diamond armor
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.diamondarmor

permissions.description: Allows to create a shop that sells diamond tools
permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.diamondtools

permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.goldarmor

permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.netherblocks

permissions.name: ChestShop.shop.create.misc
